name: Haim Schweitzer
content: Haim Schweitzer Haim Schweitzer The University of Texas at Dallas Mail Stop EC 31 800 W Campbell Rd Richardson, TX 75083-0688 (972) 883-2238 (office) haim@utdallas.edu Professor of Computer Science at The University of Texas at Dallas. Research interests are in computer vision, machine learning, data representations, and related Internet technology. Selected publications Restricted Access
